title: Arunachal: 98 small hydro projects registered for carbon credits under Universal Carbon Registration
description: Arunachal Pradesh deputy Chief Minister Chowna Mein said that the successful implementation of these projects will not only bolsters the state's economy but also contributes to the nation's energy security through clean and renewable sources.
